Text.Page:
Go to {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold} and visit {@LinkCreature:245#3511#Volvur} at {@Rgn:45009}.

He's hit a snag in his investigation, and requested someone with your unique skill set.

My research focuses on the link between the argons and the impact they make on the world. It's much more exciting than it sounds.

I'll rely upon you to collect samples, particularly from things that might try to eat me.

Oh, these will do nicely.

I appreciate your aid, as does the entire Invalesco.

It's astonishing what you can learn from a creature's teeth. I'd like to focus on {@LinkCreature:45#3004#athakela stalkers}.

Hunt them and bring me their fangs.

Well, this is both fascinating and disgusting.

Oh, well. No one promised me clean fingers.

I'm curious about the biological changes to {@LinkCreature:45#4002#argonomorph tuwangis}.

Bring me samples of their blood for comparison.

Ah, yes. Argonite ore.

It's not really made of argons, of course, but I suspect their presence impacted the mineral all the same.

I'd like samples of argonite ore. It's a relatively rare mineral that the Invalesco believes is tied to the work the argons did here.

Please collect some for me.
